title: What if game: Your Main is getting Reworked, but you get to choose the Rioter who does it.
body:
Oh no! Your main is getting Reworked:


http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Hahaha-No-Meme-28.gif

But you get to pick the Rioter who is in charge of the rework.

 https://38.media.tumblr.com/5fd9b5025f3b0084eed3d6092dcf79ae/tumblr_mkic23IOd71rvyk1to1_500.gif

Who would you pick and why?
 [here is the list of Rioters in case you need it ](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Riot_Games_staff) 
(Rioters who worked on champs should be under game designers)
**rules**:
1. It doesn't matter what champ it is, they are getting a Rework. Even if they just got a rework  or getting one soon (yes, that means {{champion:13}} would be getting a re-re-re-rework)
2. Try to stick with Rioters who work on champs and currently work for Riot. (_ recommended, not required. Pick a splash Artist if you feel particularly rebellious :p_) 
3. It can be anything from a {{champion:14}} level Rework to a {{champion:86}} level one, but something in their kit is going to change.
5. Keep it friendly. 
**bonus**: How would you rework your main if they had to get a rework?

Main: {{champion:62}} 
Rioter: Riot Gypsylord
 {{champion:202}} was a champ that I was sceptical about during his teaser, but after seeing his kit and using him in game, he has become my favorite ADC. He also worked partially on my secondary main {{champion:150}} and looking at {{champion:254}} as a reference for a champ more like {{champion:62}} that he's worked on, I think he would be able to do Wukong justice.

bonus: {{champion:62}} (light rework)
W: Decoy
(**new**) passive: Wukongs staff extends, increasing his range by 5/10/15 at levels 6/13/18

**active**: Wukong becomes invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal 70/115/160/205/250 (+60% Ability Power) Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds. 
(**new**) Monkey see, Monkey do: if Wukong uses his Q or E while his decoy is active, it will copy Wukong

**Q**: If the enemy is hit is within range of the decoy, the decoy will also strike the enemy, dealing light damage and reducing their armor further by 5/6/8/9/10%.

**E**: the decoy will dash to the same target as Wukong, dealing light bonus damage and increasing the duration of his attack speed bonus to 6 seconds instead of 4.
